meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Abby Drwecki Peter Jury Francis Lansangan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6252.

td.p: Abby Drwecki, an anthropologist from Arvada, Colorado
Peter Jury, a clothier from Ellington, Connecticut
Francis Lansangan, a military analyst from Virginia Beach, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,401)

tr.td: OLD TESTAMENT WOMEN
2011 NEWS
CARTOON VOICES
WHERE YA FROM?
PUT ON A SUIT
A DISH OF YIDDISH

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: All three of you forgot the all-important--and I love the bill--the Thomas Jefferson $2 bill. The correct response is [*].)
PeterWhat is $76?
$14,000
AbbyWhat is 76 [on next line] 5+1+20=26+50=76
$13,199
FrancisWhat is $76?
$8,401
$78')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Adding up the denominations of circulating bills with U.S. presidents on the front gives you this total')

tr.td: U.S. MONEY MATH
Adding up the denominations of circulating bills with U.S. presidents on the front gives you this total
Francis
Peter
Abby
2-day champion: $40,000
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Francis
Peter
Abby

24 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W

16 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W
